body:
With the addition of 10 new prestiges I assume there will be a growing amount of prestiges soon! Rather than people spamming the forums with a load of prestige threads I figured they could all be put on one thread so that these people still get some recognition for their hard work! I'll try to update this whenever a new prestige is reached by someone, so try to get a screenie! Can be any of the prestiges (1-15).

Happy prestiging! ;D

title: Prestige Thread :^]
